name: modal
author: Mahmud1087
preview: A reusable modal/dialog component for displaying forms, confirmation boxes, and alerts. Should include accessibility features, animations, and flexible content placement.

props.name: open
props.description: Controls the visibility of the modal

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback function triggered when the modal should close

props.name: children
props.description: Modal content - typically Modal.Header, Modal.Body, and Modal.Footer components

props.name: size
props.description: Sets the maximum width of the modal

props.name: closeOnOverlay
props.description: Whether clicking the overlay/backdrop closes the modal

props.name: closeOnEsc
props.description: Whether pressing the ESC key closes the modal

props.name: showCloseButton
props.description: Whether to display the X close button in the top-right corner

props.name: children
props.description: Header content - typically the modal title

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the header

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the body

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the footer
